The actual number of positive COVID: 19 tests among children aged under 1 year in Nueces County, Texas was 52, not 85 as initially claimed.
The figure of 85 referred to the total n: including those aged between 1 and 2 years.
The misunderstanding of the true figure: 4. The error made by the Nueces County Public Health Director was repeated by the Nueces County Judge and later reported by CNN, further spreading the misinformation.
